Metadata.defaultTitle: Bunshin 3D | AI Image to STL & GLB Converter
Metadata.description: Instantly transform your images, logos, and drawings into 3D models (STL, OBJ, GLB) optimized for 3D printing and video games.
Metadata.keywords: image to 3d converter, logo to stl, ai 3d, 3d model generator, ai 3d printing, image to stl, logo to 3d, 2d to 3d conversion
Metadata.creator: Bunshin 3D
Metadata.ogTitle: Bunshin 3D - The AI that Sculpts your Images
Metadata.ogDescription: Generate production-ready 3D files from any 2D image in seconds.
Metadata.twitterDescription: Generate production-ready 3D files from any 2D image.

Hero.title: Turn 2D Pixels into
Hero.subtitle: The most advanced AI pipeline for 3D Printing and Game Dev. Convert any image to GLB/STL in seconds with production-grade topology.

Showcase.title: Generated with Bunshin
Showcase.subtitle: From simple logos to complex characters. No manual sculpting required.

Features.title: Production Ready Architecture
Features.subtitle: Built for professionals who need speed, precision, and automation.
Features.speedDesc: GPU-accelerated inference generates models in < 30 seconds.
Features.topologyDesc: Quad-based mesh optimization for animation and rigging.
Features.exportDesc: Native export to GLB, FBX, OBJ and watertight STL for printing.

Steps.title: How it Works
Steps.step1Desc: Drag & drop any PNG, JPG or WEBP.
Steps.step2Desc: Our Trellis Engine reconstructs depth and texture.
Steps.step3Desc: Get your asset game-ready or print-ready.

CTA.title: Ready to materialize your ideas?
CTA.subtitle: Join thousands of creators using Bunshin 3D today.

Footer.tagline: The most advanced 2D to 3D conversion architecture. Designed for creators, optimized for performance.
Footer.brandDesc: The next generation of AI-powered 3D creation tools. Built for artists, by artists.

Terms.title: Terms of Service
Terms.intro: Welcome to Bunshin 3D. By using our services, you agree to these terms.
Terms.section1Text: Our service allows you to generate 3D models using AI. You must use this service in compliance with all applicable laws.
Terms.section2Text: You retain rights to the models you generate, subject to the license granted to us to host and display them.
Terms.section3Text: The service is provided 'as is'. We are not liable for any damages arising from its use.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.intro: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we handle your data.
Privacy.section1Text: We collect your email and uploaded images solely for the purpose of providing the service.
Privacy.section2Text: We do not sell your data. Your images are processed by our AI providers and stored securely.
Privacy.section3Text: You can request the deletion of your account and data at any time via your dashboard.

Metadata.title: Text to 3D - Standard
Metadata.description: Generate 3D models from text descriptions using AI. 1 credit per generation.

Form.promptPlaceholder: A futuristic robot standing on a platform...
Form.insufficientCredits: Insufficient credits. You need 1 credit to generate.

Tips.title: Tips for best results
Tips.tip1: Be specific about the object shape and details
Tips.tip2: Mention the viewing angle (isometric, front view, etc.)
Tips.tip3: Avoid complex scenes with multiple objects
Tips.tip4: Standard quality is perfect for prototypes and concepts
